Paper Plane.ingredients: Bourbon whiskey(30ml), Amaro Nonino(30ml), Aperol(30ml), Lemon Juice(30ml)
Paper Plane.tip: If the ratio of each material is maintained at 1:1:1:1 and the capacity is changed, it can be made according to the size of the glass.

Old fashioned.recipe: 1. Put ice in the glass first. 2. Divide whiskey 2-3 times and stir.
Old fashioned.tip: If you want to eat smoky, garnish with cinnamon sticks.

Rose Collins.ingredients: Bourbon Whiskey(50ml), Lemon Juice(20ml), Demerara(7ml), Angostura Bitters(2dashes), Sparkling Water(Pull-up)
Rose Collins.tip: If you twist the lemon peel with it, the flavor is better.

Ward Eight.ingredients: Rye Whiskey(60ml), Lemon Juice(15ml), Orange Juice(15ml), Grenadine Syrup(2bsp)
Ward Eight.tip: It's a light feeling of 'paper plane'.

Little Italy.ingredients: Bourbon Whiskey(45ml), Cynar(15ml), Sweet Vermouth(22.5ml), Angostura Bitters(2dashes)

Penicillin.ingredients: Blended Whiskey(30ml), Lemon Juice(17ml), Gingerhoneysyrup(15ml), Peat Whiskey(15ml)
Penicillin.tip: If you put the peat whisky separately at the end, the peat is more alive.

Mint Julep.ingredients: Bourbon Whiskey(70ml), Mint(1 handful), Demerara(10ml), Angostura Bitters(2 dashes)
Mint Julep.recipe: 1. Add all the ingredients and mash them with a mudler. 2. Fill the glass with crushed ice and put garnish on top.

Newyork Sour.ingredients: Bourbon Whiskey(70ml), Lemon Juice(30ml), Demerara(15ml), Angostura Bitters(2 dashes), Egg White, Red Wine(30ml)
Newyork Sour.recipe: 1. Add all ingredients except red wine and shake. 2. Float red wine using a baspoon.

Irish Made.ingredients: Cucumber(2 pieces), Irish Whiskey(60ml), St-germain(15ml), Lemon Juice(22.5ml), Suger Syrup(22.5ml)
Irish Made.recipe: *Mash cucumber with mudler after adding all the ingredients.

Mocha Martini.ingredients: Bourbon Whiskey(45ml), Espresso(30ml), Baileys(15ml), Cacao Brown Liquer(15ml), Whipped Cream(15ml), Maple Syrup(1tsp)
Mocha Martini.tip: Because it contains whipped cream, shake it to make a lot of foam.

Manhattan.ingredients: Rye Whiskey(50ml), Sweet Vermouth(20ml), Angostura Bitters(2 dashes), Orange Bitters(1 dash)
Manhattan.tip: If you coat the lip and column of the glass with orange peel oil, you can enjoy the cocktail more.

Whiskey Smash.ingredients: Lemon Wedge(3ea), Mint leaves(4ea), Bourbon Whiskey(50ml), Suger Syrup(10ml)
Whiskey Smash.recipe: *Mash ingredients with mudler after adding all of them.

SideCar.tip: If the cocktail is too sour, add a little sugar syrup.

Brandy Cruster.ingredients: Cognac(60ml), Luxardo(1bsp), Grand Marnier(20ml), Lemon Juice(7.5ml)
Brandy Cruster.recipe: Rim the sugar in the lip of the glass.

Between the Sheets.ingredients: Brandy(15ml), White Rum(15ml), Cointreau(15ml), Lemon Juice(15ml)
Between the Sheets.recipe: You can use Triple Sec instead of Cointreau.
Between the Sheets.tip: It's a sedative drink that you drink before you go to bed.

Brandy Alexander.ingredients: Brandy(30ml), Liquer of Cacao White(30ml), Milk(30ml)
Brandy Alexander.tip: It is better to mix milk with cream in an appropriate ratio.

Jack Rose.ingredients: Calvados(50ml), Lemon Juice(15ml), Lime Juice(7.5ml), Suger Syrup(7.5ml), Grenadin Syrup(5ml), Orange Bitters(1 dash)

Elderflower Cosmo.ingredients: Vodka(45ml), Elderflower Liquer(30ml), Pineapple Juice(20ml), Lime Juice(7.5ml)

Sea Breeze.tip: It is also delicious to add aperol as a kick.

Espresso Martini.tip: You can use other coffee liqueurs instead of kalua.

Long Island Icetea.recipe: 1. Shake ingredients except coke. 2. Pull up the coke.
Long Island Icetea.tip: You can use Cointru instead of Triple Sec.

Jin Fizz.ingredients: Jin(43ml), Lemon Juice(20ml), Sugar Syrup(7ml), Sparkling Water
Jin Fizz.recipe: 1. Shake ingredients except sparkling water. 2. Pull up the sparkling water.
Jin Fizz.tip: Adjust sugar syrup to the acidity of lemon juice.

French75.ingredients: Jin(43ml), Lemon Juice(20ml), Sugar Syrup(7ml), Prosecco
French75.recipe: 1. Shake ingredients except prosecco. 2. Pull up the prosecco.
French75.tip: Prosecco is another to Champagne or white wines available., It's similar to Jin Fizz, but it's a less sour cocktail.

Last Word.ingredients: Gin(30ml), Chartreuse Green(30ml), Luxardo(30ml), Lime Juice(30ml)

Negroni.tip: Since sweet vermouth is a wine base, when mixed with water, the acidity comes up.

Tuxedo No.2.tip: If you are going to eat it dry, reduce Luxardo to 5ml and manufacture it.

Singapore Sling.tip: Floating the darkrum at the end is the original recipe.

Dry Martini.tip: Select and manufacture gin according to the feeling of the desired cocktail.

Sunflower.ingredients: Jin(20ml), Triple Sec(20ml), St.Germain(20ml), Lemon Juice(20ml)

Mojito.ingredients: Lime(a half), Rum(40ml), Sugar Syrup(30ml), Lime Juice(20ml), Mint(a handful), Sparkling Water
Mojito.recipe: 1. Muddling the lime half. 2. Add half-zoom of mint and muddle with spoon. 3. Fill in the crushed ice. 4. Fill it with carbonated water and garnish it.
Mojito.tip: If you mix sugar syrup with fashion fruit syrup and make a cocktail, you can make it more colorful.

Mojito Virgin.ingredients: Lime(a half), Sugar Syrup(30ml), Lime Juice(20ml), Mint(a handful), Sparkling Water&Sprite
Mojito Virgin.recipe: 1. Muddling the lime half. 2. Add half-zoom of mint and muddle with spoon. 3. Fill in the crushed ice. 4. Fill with sparkling water and sprites 1:1 and garnish.
Mojito Virgin.tip: If you mix sugar syrup with fashion fruit syrup and make a cocktail, you can make it more colorful.

Boston Cooler.ingredients: Rum(40ml), Lemon Juice(17ml), Sugar Syrup(5-7ml), Angostura Bitters(1 dashes), Ginger Sparkling Water
Boston Cooler.recipe: 1. Shake all ingredients except ginger ale. 2. Pull up ginger ale.
Boston Cooler.tip: If you want to drink more dry, add sparkling water instead of ginger ale. Sugar syrup is determined by the acidity of the lemon.

Pisco Sour.ingredients: Pisco(60ml), Lemon Juice(30ml), Sugar Syrup(15ml), Angostura Bitters(4 dashes), Egg White

Pisco Sour.tip: This cocktail, which originated in South America, has a slightly different recipe from region to region. Peru uses lemon juice and no bitters, but Chile uses lime juice and bitters

Ms, Blue Sky.ingredients: Limonce(30ml), Vodka(20ml), Lemon Juice(15ml), Passionfruit Syrup(10ml), Sugar Syrup(10ml), Milk(15ml), Cream(15ml), OrangeFlowerWater(1 dash), Blue Curacao(10ml)

Caipirinha.ingredients: Lime(A half), Cachaca Rum(50ml), Sugar Syrup(25ml)
Caipirinha.recipe: 1. Add lime first and muddle. 2. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with crushed ice. 3. Stir well with a barspoon.
Caipirinha.tip: You can use other rums, but the basic thing about this cocktail is to use good cachaa rum.

Caipiroska.recipe: 1. Add lime first and muddle. 2. Add the remaining ingredients and fill with crushed ice. 3. Stir well with a barspoon.
Caipiroska.tip: The cocktail, created for marketing purposes by the Swedish vodka brand, has been a great success in South America and other countries.
